Reviews.Title: Surveillance camera displays daytime quality pictures at night
Reviews.Author: Richard J.
Reviews.Content: The IK-7200-A Bullet Surveillance camera delivers everything that was advertised.  The camera is easy to use and operate, and provides quality black and white nighttime images that are superior to the pure infra-red nightime images.  The camera is more expensive than the typical infra-red camera, but is an excellent buy among cameras with comparable quality nighttime  images.

ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba IK-7200A Analog Bullet Camera, 480 TV Lines, 3.7-10mm Lens, 12V DC, IP66 Built in IR LEDs
